Auth.Des: ActoDriving theory test made simple for millions of learner drivers.

forgotPass.Description: Please Enter your Email Address To Receive a Verification Code

OTPScreen.otpDesc: We Have Sent an OTP to Your Email address

resetPass.resetpassDesc: Your New Password Must Be Different From Previously Used Password

Home.mocktestsummary: Mock test results are a good indicator of what to expect on the real test.
Home.topicsummary: Learn one topic at a time. The test will contain questions only from the selected topic.
Home.mistakesummary: Have another go at questions that you got wrong before.
Home.hazardsummary: Choose from 34 Hazard Perception Tests to ready yourself for the actual test.
Home.highwaycode_Summary: Your theory test is based on the Highway Code. It is part of the essential reading.
Home.signs_summary: The essential reading list to learn
Home.s_summary: The essential reading materials for the theory test

setting.logout_desc: Are you sure you want to log out your account permanently?
setting.logout_mess: once you logout your account, we can't notify you of new matches if you do.

Delete.Permission_Mes: Your account and all related data will be permanently deleted. Do you want to proceed with this action?

header.leavemess: Are you sure you want to Quit the Test?

errors.tryagain: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errors.errPasswordValidation: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
errors.passLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.IncorrectPass: Wrong password. Try again or click 'Forgot Password' to reset it.
